title: Portrait of Louise McGuire Williams
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Sticker

verso, writt at lower left edge: [W.H. Baker 1852]
description: 3/4 length portrait of a woman seated in a red upholstered chair; she holds a fan and wears a black dress with black lace shawl; red drapery hangs behind to her right; gold frame; gold frame
